resources.string: This will delete all content on the microSD and restart the device once finished. Do you want to continue?
Waiting for the system to unmount the partitions (30 seconds)
Formatting the new data partition with Ext4
Copying data from the DATA partition
Root access not detected. Please check the GitHub page for more information.
It was detected that the SD is already mounted in Data, so the application will exit.
MicroSD card not detected, the application cannot continue.

DJI RC Data2SD is an application designed to expand the internal storage of your DJI RC device using a microSD card. By pressing the \'Run data2SD\' button, the application swap the data partition to the microSD card, freeing up space on the internal storage. This setup allows you to safely perform software tests, as the operating system partition remains protected and is restored when the device is restarted. Please note that this application is provided without warranty. The user assumes all responsibility for the use of this software.

Warning: This application has been tested exclusively on the DJI RC (rm330) model. Compatibility with other models is not guaranteed. Use on unsupported devices is at your own risk, and the user assumes all responsibility for any consequences.
Mounting the SD card to the correct locations and restarting the system user interface.
